sys_hub_flow.name: CC Service Request

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: wait for COR to be assigned
update the RITM with values from the variables
auto close the original request item
update who the ITPM is in the original request to the ITPM who approved this request
create task for ITPM to attach quote to RITM

sys_variable_value.value: Generate and attach quote to RITM

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please generate a quote to be sent to the point of contact for approval for this request.^assignment_group={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{91e38f9b-f965-4363-9928-60f9a96542aa.itpm}}^due_date=fd-scripted

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: get the variables from the original request
notify Requested For and POC that ITPM has rejected CCSR
generate TASK For PMO to get SOW & Quote or PMO from vendor

sys_variable_value.value: Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor and attach to original Contact Center Service Request^u_assignment_organization={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.u_assignment_organization}}^assignment_group={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assigned_to}}^due_date=fd-scripted

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Wait until a PMO gets assigned the request
notify clients that a task order has been generated for implementation by the COR
find the ITPM who approved
generate a TASK for the PMO to verify the requirements of the request

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please verify requirements with the client before moving on^assignment_group={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assigned_to}}^u_assignment_organization={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.u_assignment_organization}}^due_date=fd-scripted

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Notify Clients that SOW & quote or ROM completed.
Create a task for COR to open a TASK for vendor implementation

sys_variable_value.value: assignment_group={"display":"EID-DAR/COR Support","value":"59d34c811bce2490a13aecace54bcbe2"}^description=Please open a task order for this Contact Center Service Request and attach a copy to the request.^due_date=fd-scripted
Generate a Task Order for Vendor Implementation

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: update who the COR is on the original request
have COR close the request when vendor implementation done

sys_element_mapping.value: description=upon notification that Vendor Implementation is done, please verify completion.^assigned_to={{2faa9419-f4e1-4888-95cb-84019fbf67d0.cor}}^due_date=fd-scripted

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: retrive who the COR is to assign the next step
get approval from ITPM
POC must approves budget & requirement from ITPM
notify clients that ITPM has approved

update the RITM with values from the variables
auto close the original request item
update who the ITPM is in the original request to the ITPM who approved this request
create task for ITPM to attach quote to RITM

sys_variable_value.value: Generate and attach quote to RITM

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please generate a quote to be sent to the point of contact for approval for this request.^assignment_group={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{91e38f9b-f965-4363-9928-60f9a96542aa.itpm}}^due_date=fd-scripted

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: get the variables from the original request
notify Requested For and POC that ITPM has rejected CCSR
generate TASK For PMO to get SOW & Quote or PMO from vendor

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor and attach to original Contact Center Service Request^u_assignment_organization={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.u_assignment_organization}}^assignment_group={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assigned_to}}^due_date=fd-scripted

notify clients that a task order has been generated for implementation by the COR

sys_hub_flow_snapshot.name: CC Service Request

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Notify Clients that SOW & quote or ROM completed.
find the ITPM who approved
update who the COR is on the original request
retrive who the COR is to assign the next step
notify clients that a task order has been generated for implementation by the COR
get approval from ITPM
notify clients that ITPM has approved
Create a task for COR to open a TASK for vendor implementation

sys_variable_value.value: assignment_group={"display":"EID-DAR/COR Support","value":"59d34c811bce2490a13aecace54bcbe2"}^description=Please open a task order for this Contact Center Service Request and attach a copy to the request.^due_date=fd-scripted
Generate a Task Order for Vendor Implementation

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: have COR close the request when vendor implementation done

sys_element_mapping.value: description=upon notification that Vendor Implementation is done, please verify completion.^assigned_to={{2faa9419-f4e1-4888-95cb-84019fbf67d0.cor}}^due_date=fd-scripted

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: auto close the original request item
Wait until a PMO gets assigned the request
get the variables from the original request
update the RITM with values from the variables
generate TASK For PMO to get SOW & Quote or PMO from vendor

sys_variable_value.value: Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor and attach to original Contact Center Service Request^u_assignment_organization={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.u_assignment_organization}}^assignment_group={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assigned_to}}^due_date=fd-scripted

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: notify Requested For and POC that ITPM has rejected CCSR
generate a TASK for the PMO to verify the requirements of the request

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please verify requirements with the client before moving on^assignment_group={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assigned_to}}^u_assignment_organization={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.u_assignment_organization}}^due_date=fd-scripted

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: create task for ITPM to attach quote to RITM

sys_variable_value.value: Generate and attach quote to RITM

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please generate a quote to be sent to the point of contact for approval for this request.^assignment_group={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{91e38f9b-f965-4363-9928-60f9a96542aa.itpm}}^due_date=fd-scripted

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: POC must approves budget & requirement from ITPM
update who the ITPM is in the original request to the ITPM who approved this request
wait for COR to be assigned
